description: Down or up, steep or steady, the Landfarer Bike Shorts are at home on any trail. These stand-alone bottoms feature a minimal elastic waistband with a button closure; stretchy, breathable fabric; and the longest inseam in our MTB line, making the fit as comfortable as it is versatile. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Landfarer Bike Shorts - Mens
